nodes.text: A city was located on the planet Yerbana, and could be reached by a single bridge across a chasm. During the Outer Rim Sieges of the Clone Wars, the Confederacy of Independent Systems occupied the city with a large force of battle droids, causing the people of the city to suffer. The Galactic Republic launched an attack on the Separatist forces in order to save the city, and Jedi General Anakin Skywalker successfully destroyed the tactical droid in command of the forces.
